CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a second time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a third time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a fourth time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a fifth time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a sixth time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
Viking: This is my Hammer, and I will fight ANYONE for a seventh time. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
[L]Viking: I could never doubt you, my fair one. You have always been true in my hour of need. Together we have won battles without number!
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: Yet it has been many, many feasts since all hailed me as The Champion of Champions! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Alien: Bödvar, are you speaking to your hammer?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [L]Viking: Hail and welcome, Lord Vraxx. Aye, I was preparing us both for the tourney. Only my weapons truly know me from boot to beard.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [R]Alien: Does that heavy hammer of yours answer you back when you whisper to it?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep5: [R]Alien: My Atomic Blasters speak, but they have a rather limited range of conversation. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_vraxx_guns_01
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep6: [L]Viking: Ha HA! When guns talk, 'tis good that they speak of important matters like finding a target in need of a blast or two.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep7: [R]Alien: Shall we begin? These gawking gods and lounging legends are salivating for us to battle once again. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_Bodvar_v_Vraxx
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep8: [L]Viking: Aye, Moon Man, let us see what hammer and blaster have to say to one another!

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking: I have faith in you, fair one. You've always been there in my hour of need. Together we've won battles without number! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_arena_bg
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: Yet it has been many, many feasts since all hailed me as The Champion of Champions! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hold_hammer
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Alien: Bödvar, are you speaking to your hammer?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [L]Viking: Hail, Lord Vraxx. I was preparing us both for the tourney. These masterwork weapons truly know me from boot to beard. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_Bodvar_v_Vraxx
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [R]Alien: Does that heavy hammer of yours answer you back when you whisper to it? CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hammer01
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep5: [R]Alien: My Atomic Blasters say a few words, but they have a rather limited range of conversation. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_vraxx_guns_01
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep6: [L]Viking: Ha HA! When guns talk, 'tis good that they speak of important matters like finding targets in need blasting.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep7: [R]Alien: Shall we begin? These gawking gods and lounging legends are salivating for us to battle once again. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_Bodvar_v_Vraxx
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep8: [L]Viking: Aye, Moon Man, let us see what hammer and blaster have to say to one another!

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking(FaceVictory): A beginning worthy of song, my sweetie! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hold_hammer
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: Now let your fellow weapons join in our glorious tale. CHANGEPIC: a_cutscenePic_bodvar_weapons
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Highwayman: I AM RANDOMLY PICKED. THIS IS A CATCHPHRASE FROM ME! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_hotspur_v_1random

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking(FaceVictory): The third round begins soon. Hammer my dear friend, we've almost made it through Day One! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_hold_hammer
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: We must best these two foes to advance towards victory. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_2random
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Witch: I AM RANDOMLY PICKED. Can you handle the pair of us?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [L]Viking: Even two of you can't keep me from victory's sweet embrace.

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking(FaceVictory): The first day finished, and I've suffered scarce a scratch! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_weapons
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: Hammer, you serve me true. Sword, your razor edge shall never dull. Lance, you...
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Valkyrie: Bödvar, I see you're thanking your weapons once again. It is good that you honor your tools.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [L]Viking: They're not tools, Volst, they are my family. Why, I remember one time when... CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_volst
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [R]Valkyrie: But you rely on them too much, brave Bödvar. The newest contender, Hotspur, is a master swordsman and has bested all his rivals today.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep5: [R]Valkyrie: If you want the Champion's Crown again, you'll need to use more versatlie strategies.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep6: [L]Viking: You speak of those cowardly bombs and spheres. I prefer a weapon that knows its place is in my hands.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep7: [R]Valkyrie: That might explain why you haven't won the tournament in so long.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep8: [L]Viking: Hmmf! Well, if it would please you, I could play your game of tossing to and fro, just to show you I am flexible when needs be.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep9: [R]Valkyrie: A wise decision, Bödvar. We will give you a fine lesson, and you won't be needing your weapons.

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking(FaceVictory): Day Two and the hour for for Round 5 arrives! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_forest_bg
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Valkyrie: I will be fighting by your side this round, but our foes have more revocery chances then we will, so we'll need to be twice as good. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_volst_v_2random
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Cowgirl: I AM RANDOMLY PICKED. Can you handle me?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [R]Highwayman: I AM RANDOM TOO Can you handle us both?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [L]Viking: Today I could best twice your number!

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking(FaceVictory): Just one victory stands between me and the championship round. I have word that Hotspur awaits me in the final arena. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_arena_bg
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Cowgirl: I AM RANDOM You must defeat all three of us. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_3random
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Witch: I AM RANDOMLY PICKED. Can you face three great warriors?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [R]Caveman: I AM RANDOM TOO Fight now!

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [L]Viking: The Championship Round! At last I shall cross blades with this Hotspur, who has caused such a stir. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_hotspur
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [L]Viking: Well met, warrior. You have made a name for yourself with your victories this day. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_hotspur_body
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [R]Knight: Hail, Bödvar. Your legend is writ in the stars, and 'tis an honour to face thee.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [L]Viking: No one has won more tourneys than me, knight. You will have the honor of losing to the best. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_hotspur
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [R]Knight: There is not room in the stars for both our names, Bödvar.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep5: [R]Knight: By blade and brawn I shall cast thee down from the heavens and write mine own name in the night's sky. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_hotspur_body
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep6: [L]Viking: I've bested men and giants, armies and dragons. You'll learn what a true champion is today.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep7: [R]Knight: The time for boasts and bluster is passed. To arms, sirrah! Let us begin. CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_v_hotspur

CutsceneType.CutsceneStep0: [R]Valkyrie: Congratulations, Bödvar! You won 12,381st Tournament of Legends! CHANGEPIC: a_CutscenePic_bodvar_wins
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep1: [R]Knight: You fought with honour and skill, Sir Bödvar. I bow to you as champion.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep2: [L]Viking: To have defeated a swordsman of your prowess, makes the victory all the greater honor.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep3: [L]Viking: I could not have wished for a more worthy opponent.
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep4: [R]Valkyrie: This is your 214th victory, Bödvar, your first in over 100 tournaments. What's next for you?
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep5: [L]Viking: Tonight we FEAST! Mead and roast boar for all, sleep and rest for none!
CutsceneType.CutsceneStep6: [L]Viking: We shall all be full of drink and meat by morning...
